title: Trezor dependency and protobuf
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [ ] Foundry
- [ ] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

latest

### What command(s) is the bug in?

_No response_

### Operating System

None

### Describe the bug

I consume forge as a library. When compiling, it surfaced the following errors. `forge` builds fine, but can't be built as a dep of another project. 

I messed around with the dependencies, but I didn't figure it out. I tried upgrading `protobuf` version in foundry, but didn't work.

```
    Checking ethers-providers v2.0.10
    Checking trezor-client v0.1.0
   Compiling pest_meta v2.7.5
    Checking ethers-core v2.0.10 (https://github.com/gakonst/ethers-rs#9754f22d)
   Compiling phylax v0.0.1 (/Users/odysseas/code/odyslam/phylax/bin/phylax)
error[E0599]: no method named `git_sha` found for struct `EmitBuilder` in the current scope
 --> bin/phylax/build.rs:8:10
  |
7 | /     EmitBuilder::builder()
8 | |         .git_sha(true)
  | |         -^^^^^^^ method not found in `EmitBuilder`
  | |_________|
  |

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0599`.
error: could not compile `phylax` (build script) due to previous error
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error[E0425]: cannot find value `VERSION_3_2_0` in crate `protobuf`

For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0046`.
```

You have to use the same patches we use: <https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/blob/e82f5bd0380a5990065cf1ea43a4ce4fb6648271/Cargo.toml#L189-L204>

In general we cannot recommend anyone use foundry as libraries since literally nothing is stable and we're going through major refactors

aha, I always forget that patches do not propagate when using a crate as a dep.

@DaniPopes maybe we should remove the patch and have the dep be from git? Now, it reads the solang dep from the locked ethers v2, but in reality it uses the newer version from the patch:

```
    Updating git repository `https://github.com/gakonst/ethers-rs`
    Updating crates.io index
error: failed to select a version for `solang-parser`.
    ... required by package `forge-fmt v0.2.0 (https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry#e82f5bd0)`
    ... which satisfies git dependency `forge-fmt` (locked to 0.2.0) of package `foundry-utils v0.2.0 (https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry#e82f5bd0)`
    ... which satisfies git dependency `foundry-utils` (locked to 0.2.0) of package `foundry-cli v0.2.0 (https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry#e82f5bd0)`
    ... which satisfies git dependency `foundry-cli` (locked to 0.2.0) of package `phylax-monitor v0.0.1 (/Users/odysseas/code/odyslam/phylax/crates/monitor)`
    ... which satisfies path dependency `phylax-monitor` (locked to 0.0.1) of package `phylax-core v0.0.1 (/Users/odysseas/code/odyslam/phylax/crates/coreNG)`
    ... which satisfies path dependency `phylax-core` (locked to 0.0.1) of package `phylax v0.0.1 (/Users/odysseas/code/odyslam/phylax/bin/phylax)`
versions that meet the requirements `=0.3.2` (locked to 0.3.2) are: 0.3.2

all possible versions conflict with previously selected packages.

  previously selected package `solang-parser v0.3.3`
    ... which satisfies dependency `solang-parser = "=0.3.3"` of package `ethers-solc v2.0.10 (https://github.com/gakonst/ethers-rs#b60c7fe1)`
    ... which satisfies dependency `ethers-solc = "^2.0"` (locked to 2.0.10) of package `foundry-common v0.2.0 (https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry#e82f5bd0)`
    ... which satisfies git dependency `foundry-common` (locked to 0.2.0) of package `phylax-core v0.0.1 (/Users/odysseas/code/odyslam/phylax/crates/coreNG)`
    ... which satisfies path dependency `phylax-core` (locked to 0.0.1) of package `phylax v0.0.1 (/Users/odysseas/code/odyslam/phylax/bin/phylax)`
```
